name: AMERICAN RENTAL ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association for rental equipment manufacturers and suppliers.
sampleDescriptions: Tax issues related to the rental industry.
Issues related to coronavirus relief packages.
Issues related to the rental industry. Extension of full expensing and the 199A pass-through deduction. Reinstatement of R&D expensing. Sec. 45W Commercial Clean Vehicle Credit.

Issues related to the rental industry. Extension of full expensing and the 199A pass-through deduction. Reinstatement of R&D expensing. Sec. 45W Commercial Clean Vehicle Credit; monitor issues related to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) P.L. 115-97.

Issues related to the rental industry. Extension of full expensing and the 199A pass-through deduction. Reinstatement of R&D expensing. Sec. 45W Commercial Clean Vehicle Credit; monitor issues related to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) P.L. 115-97 and H.R. 1, the One Big Beautiful Bill Act (OBBB) P.L. 119-21.
